title: Tokenization Firm Securitize Aims for Public Listing Via SPAC Deal at $1.25B Valuation
contentSnippet: Existing investors like ARK Invest and BlackRock will maintain their stakes, with additional investment from a $225 million PIPE financing round.

title: Myriad Launches on BNB Chain, Adds Automated Markets
contentSnippet: The prediction protocol is launching new markets built for speed and simplicity, alongside localized experiences including Mandarin.

title: Circle launches Arc public testnet with over 100 institutional participants including BlackRock, Visa and Anthropic
contentSnippet: More than 100 firms across finance, payments, and technology are participating in the network's early development.

title: Benchmark Sees Hut 8 as Hybrid AI–Bitcoin Power Play, Price Target Doubled to $78
contentSnippet: The Wall Street broker said Hut 8’s shift to energy infrastructure from bitcoin mining makes it a unique bet on AI, HPC and future power-hungry technologies.

title: Japan's $2T Payment Provider TIS Rolls Out Multi-Token Platform With Avalanche
contentSnippet: The payments firm's platform, developed with AvaCloud, aims to help banks, corporates issue and settle stablecoins and tokenized assets.

title: Coinbase Prime and Figment expand institutional staking to Solana, Cardano, Sui and other networks
contentSnippet: The collaboration has already enabled more than $2 billion in staked assets since launching in early 2024.

title: Crypto Markets Today: BTC Holds at $114.5K, HBAR Soars on ETF News
contentSnippet: Crypto markets paused after Monday’s surge, with bitcoin steady near $114,500 and ether slipping slightly. Hedera’s HBAR led altcoin gains.

title: Figment Scales Coinbase Prime Staking as 2 ETFs With Yield Launch This Week
contentSnippet: Institutions can now stake Solana, Avalanche, and other PoS assets in custody via Coinbase Prime, just as ETF-driven staking demand ramps up.

title: Bank of Korea Warns on Stablecoin Depeg Risks, Says Banks Should Lead
contentSnippet: The central bank warned that private stablecoin issuers lack the institutional trust needed for stable currency, citing depegging risks.

title: Bitcoin Miner Core Scientific Upgraded to Buy on AI Data Center Boom: H.C. Wainwright
contentSnippet: The investment bank upgraded the stock to buy from neutral and set a new price target of $25.

title: PayPal Surges 15% on OpenAI Payment Wallet Deal, Upbeat Earnings
contentSnippet: The payments giant raised full-year guidance, instituted a first-ever dividend, and unveiled a ChatGPT partnership to embed shopping inside AI app.

title: Citi Says Crypto’s Correlation With Stocks Tightens as Volatility Returns
contentSnippet: The bank noted that bitcoin and ether are once again moving in step with U.S. equities and gold.

title: Bitcoin Little Changed, Faces ‘Double-Edged Sword’ in Leveraged Bets: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Oct. 28, 2025

title: Circle, Issuer of USDC, Starts Testing Arc Blockchain With Big Institutions Onboard
contentSnippet: The public testnet of Arc has drawn interest from global finance and tech players including BlackRock, HSBC, Visa, AWS and Anthropic.

title: Bitget Wallet adds HyperEVM support, giving users access to Hyperliquid ecosystem
contentSnippet: Bitget Wallet said it plans on adding Hyperliquid's perpetual trading features onto the wallet system in the coming weeks.

title: Metaplanet starts share buyback program to address mNAV decline
contentSnippet: The company's board has approved the creation of a credit facility with a maximum borrowing capacity of $500 million for the program.

title: MetaMask goes multichain: one account supports EVM, Solana and soon Bitcoin
contentSnippet: The update rolls out automatically, requiring no user action, and will be made a default standard for MetaMask.

title: Nasdaq-listed Prenetics Global raises $48 million for bitcoin treasury expansion
contentSnippet: Investors participating in the latest round include Kraken, Exodus, GPTX by Jihan Wu, DL Holdings, and American Ventures.

title: Kalshi Sues New York Regulators After Crypto.com's Nevada Loss
contentSnippet: By suing first, Kalshi controls the narrative to focus on federal preemption rather than contract legality, Decrypt was told.

title: Democrat Seeks Crypto Trading Ban for Politicians Following Binance Founder’s Pardon
contentSnippet: Democrat Ro Khanna called Trump’s pardon of Binance founder Zhao “blatant corruption” as he pushes to ban politicians from trading crypto.

title: Bitcoin Leverage Nears $40 Billion Ahead of Key Fed Vote
contentSnippet: Bitcoin’s climb to $116,000 has spurred a wave of leveraged bets ahead of Wednesday’s Fed decision, as traders brace for another rate cut.

title: Gate Reinvents the Exchange Model: From Trading Platform to ‘Full Web3 Operating System’
contentSnippet: With beefed-up security, tokenized stocks, crypto travel bookings and a meme coin launchpad, Gate is offering users a more rounded experience.

title: Cathie Wood’s Ark Invest buys $31 million worth of Block Inc. shares
contentSnippet: Ark Invest also bought shares in DraftKings, which is launching its own prediction market in the near term.

title: Argentine Stablecoin Use Surged Ahead of President Milei's Midterm Election Win
contentSnippet: Argentines gambled by swapping pesos for dollar stablecoins this weekend as the local currency fluctuated in price.

title: Ohio Bill Aims to Outlaw Human-Chatbot Marriage
contentSnippet: Ohio lawmakers introduced a bill declaring AI systems nonsentient under state law.

title: Statue of Binance Founder Changpeng Zhao Coming to Washington DC After Trump Pardon
contentSnippet: Anonymous donors said they pooled funds to recognize Binance founder Changpeng "CZ" Zhao in Washington, D.C., on Tuesday with a 14-foot-tall statue.

title: Solana, Litecoin and Hedera ETFs to Begin Trading This Week
contentSnippet: Altcoin ETFs are landing this week, with Canary's Litecoin and Hedera funds and Bitwise and Grayscale Solana ETFs set to begin trading.

title: Solana ETFs in the spotlight: Bitwise’s BSOL to debut on NYSE on Tuesday
contentSnippet: Bitwise is next up to the plate as it plans to launch its ETF tracking Solana, the sixth-largest cryptocurrency by market capitalization.

title: Canary Capital to launch first US ETFs tracking Litecoin and HBAR on Nasdaq on Tuesday
contentSnippet: Canary Capital will launch an ETF tracking Litecoin and another tracking HBAR — marking the first of their kind to go live in the U.S.

title: Ethereum treasury firm ETHZilla sells of $40 million ETH as part of $250 million stock repurchase plan
contentSnippet: ETHZilla Chairman McAndrew Rudisill said the firm will continue to repurchase shares while ETHZ “trade at a significant discount to NAV."
